Instruction:

File size ISO: 4,33 GB (bajtÃƒÂ³w: 4Ã‚Â 651Ã‚Â 487Ã‚Â 232)

Burn ISO on DVD (DVD5) or mount in daemon or VMware or prepare bootable USB (8GB minimum):
Use: Rufus or other progz, or make manualy bootble USB:

How prepare bootable USB to install Windows Vista, 7, 8, 8.1:

WARNING! You do this at your own risk! Further steps delete the contents of the USB drive!
Make a copy of the earlier if you need to!

console => cmd [enter]
diskpart [enter...]

list disk
select disk [select your disk USB - carefully!]
clean
create partition primary
select partition 1
active
format fs=fat32 quick 
assign

exit
exit

copy whole DVD/.ISO on USB
install system


Activate - read info in activate.txt


WARNING!
If you have OEM key, copy/paste EI.CFG from ISO_OEM to /ISO/sources or edit ISO: in /ISO/sources/EI.CFG change Retail to OEM
